description: Try our easy to follow Oriental Chicken Mince recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Oriental Chicken Mince Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the spring onions and chilli and cook for 2 minutes. Stir in the black bean sauce, soy sauce and stock and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper and pour in the cornflour paste. Cook, stirring, until thickened slightly. Serve with the cooked rice.

Add the spring onions and chilli and cook for 2 minutes. Stir in the black bean sauce, soy sauce and stock and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper and pour in the cornflour paste. Cook, stirring, until thickened slightly. Serve with the cooked rice.
